name: Pong (itch) (manzanog)
description:
Pong is a typically pong game but with power ups and a lot a customizable features.

Includes:

  • 6 different power ups randomly generated through the gameplay.
  • Customizable features (paddles color, ball color, keys, etc).
  • 2 game modes: player vs computer & player 1 vs player 2.
  • A credits's and a rules's screen.
  • A pause screen in gameplay that can take you to the menu or continue playing.
